page.title: 07Employment
page.content: Another boring day. Fed up, sitting around, having no money and no work. Five years ago,{British Steel closed and we thought our{redundancy {money}would last forever.I had a new Fiat and new furniture and new carpets but the car went as money grew short. I did a retraining course as a chef but there is still no work. My wife got a job in one of the new small factories, sorting nuts and bolts so I'm left with the housework. I've gardened, watched television, walked for miles, done all the jobs I can to keep myself occupied but now I'm{bored with everything. I've got no money for a pint or entertainment. There seems to be nothing left.I'll have a walk to the{job centre.}Perhaps I'll be lucky and get a place on{a Man Power {Services Commission Scheme.
